overview: What's more fun than a Sean Cody threesome? A Sean Cody foursome! They're a little more on the rare side but they're definitely more fun. One extra guy is always better. In this compilation you'll get to sample foursomes from many different Sean Cody eras. An old school retro foursome called Fuckfest 2, a destination foursome in Ski Retreat Fuckfest, the amazing two-part fourway featuring Curtis, Dusty, Joey and Perry; and the conclusion to the Winter Getaway series that features Atticus, Blake, Brendan, and Robbie. If you like group sex but a threesome is just not enough man meat for you, Foursomes is the way to go.
title: Foursomes
